page.title: 10ST JOHN' C.OF E. SCHOOL
page.content: THIS SCHOOL IS 92 YEARS OLD. THE PRESENT HEADMASTER IS MR. R.HUGHES. HE HAS BEEN HERE FOR FIFTEEN YEARS.MISS C.HEATON WAS THE HEADTEACHER BEFORE HIM. WHEN THE SCHOOL BEGAN THERE WERE FOUR TEACHERS AND FIFTY SEVEN PUPILS.TODAY THERE ARE EIGHT TEACHERS AND TWO HUNDRED AND FRTY FIVE PUPILS. MRS.COLEMAN HAS BEEN HERE FOR SEVENTEEN YEARS. THE SCHOOL HAS HAD A FOOTBALL TEAM FOR 25 YEARS. IT HAS WON THE LEAGUE ONLY TWICE. IT HAS A NETBALL TEAM FOR TWELVE YEARS AND CRICKET AND SWIMMING TEAMS FOR FIFTEEN YEARS. THE SCHOOL HAS WON THE LOCAL GALA THREE TIMES. THE PARENT TEACHER ASSOCIATION IS CELEBRATING IT'S SILVER JUBILEE THIS YEAR.
